# PeopleOS Documentation

> PeopleOS is an open-source personal CRM to help you remember the details that matter about your relationships.

## Marketing Pages

- [Handbook](https://peopleos.cloud/company/handbook): Our handbook
- [Marketing](https://peopleos.cloud/company/handbook/marketing): How do I envision marketing
- [Money](https://peopleos.cloud/company/handbook/money): How does this project make money
- [Principles](https://peopleos.cloud/company/handbook/principles): Principles
- [Prioritize](https://peopleos.cloud/company/handbook/prioritize): How do we prioritize features?
- [Product philosophy](https://peopleos.cloud/company/handbook/product-philosophy): Product philosophy
- [Project](https://peopleos.cloud/company/handbook/project): Who I am and what is this project
- [Shipping](https://peopleos.cloud/company/handbook/shipping): Shipping is better than not shipping
- [Social media](https://peopleos.cloud/company/handbook/social-media): Social media
- [Where](https://peopleos.cloud/company/handbook/where): Where am I going with this
- [Why open source](https://peopleos.cloud/company/handbook/why-open-source): Why open source
- [Writing](https://peopleos.cloud/company/handbook/writing): Writing for PeopleOS
- [Company](https://peopleos.cloud/company): Our handbook
- [API management](https://peopleos.cloud/docs/api/api-management): Learn how to manage API keys
- [Authentication](https://peopleos.cloud/docs/api/authentication): Learn how to authenticate requests
- [Entries](https://peopleos.cloud/docs/api/entries): Learn how to manage journal entries
- [HTTP status codes](https://peopleos.cloud/docs/api/errors): Learn about HTTP status codes
- [Genders](https://peopleos.cloud/docs/api/genders): Learn how to manage genders
- [Gifts](https://peopleos.cloud/docs/api/gifts): Learn how to manage gifts
- [API](https://peopleos.cloud/docs/api/introduction): API reference
- [Journals](https://peopleos.cloud/docs/api/journals): Learn how to manage journals
- [Life Events](https://peopleos.cloud/docs/api/life-events): Learn how to manage life events
- [Logs](https://peopleos.cloud/docs/api/logs): Learn how to query the logs
- [Notes](https://peopleos.cloud/docs/api/notes): Learn how to manage notes
- [Profile](https://peopleos.cloud/docs/api/profile): Learn how to manage the profile of the user
- [Task categories](https://peopleos.cloud/docs/api/task-categories): Learn how to manage task categories
- [Tasks](https://peopleos.cloud/docs/api/tasks): Learn how to manage tasks
- [Update a person's age](https://peopleos.cloud/docs/api/update-age): Learn how to update a person's age
- [Update a person's physical appearance](https://peopleos.cloud/docs/api/update-physical-appearance): Learn how to update a person's physical appearance
- [Documentation](https://peopleos.cloud/docs): PeopleOS documentation
- [Homepage](https://peopleos.cloud/): Welcome page for PeopleOS.
- [Pricing](https://peopleos.cloud/pricing): Pricing information
- [Privacy policy](https://peopleos.cloud/privacy): Privacy policy
- [Terms of use](https://peopleos.cloud/terms): Terms of use
- [Why](https://peopleos.cloud/why): Why use PeopleOS?
